thread.title: A Nice Hilton -
thread.title_full: A Nice Hilton - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York Long Island City / Manhattan View, Long Island City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Tim H
title: A Nice Hilton -
text: Fairly new property, with a small and nice breakfast area, a nice bar and sitting area, pleasant environment, comfortable room, and great location for access to the subway. The staff was friendly and helpful. My only complaint was room service wasn't completed until late in the day, e.g., 4 pm, interrupting our afternoon nap, I know, kind of picky, but for us older folks, our afternoon naps are important if we are party into the night.
